title: BBC Local Live: Updates for Essex on Wednesday, 30 March 2016 - BBC News
summary: a 15-year-old boy is arrested on sus of murdering a 48-year-old man in harlow .
a ukip essex county councillor resigns because of a `` split '' in the party .
colchester united secure back-to-back wins for first time since september .
more news , sport , travel and weather updates from 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's it for essex live today - thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back in the morning from 08:00 with the latest news , sport , weather and travel for the county .
have a great evening .

documents.title: clacton pier helter-skelter nearing completion after being destroyed in storm
text: the 75-year-old helter-skelter at clacton pier , blown down by strong winds more than two years ago , is in its final stages of being rebuilt .
the attraction was destroyed after 80mph ( 129km/h ) winds hit the essex coast in october 2013 .
it was hoped the slide would be back in action in time for the easter holidays , but staff say the build is taking time as it is part of a refurbishment of the whole pier .

documents.title: 'shear ' amazement at birth of four new essex lambs
text: we could n't resist sharing the news that the `` baby boom '' season has begun at one essex attraction , with the birth of four lambs .
the new arrivals were born at the lee valley parks farm in waltham abbey over the easter weekend to some of the hebridean sheep .
the farm tells us no names have yet been chosen - but here 's a for you to say `` aww '' to .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : dry but turning chilly tonight
text: any remaining showers should largely die away to leave a mostly dry night , but with a good deal of high level cloud around .
however , there will be some clear spells and it will turn chilly with a patchy frost possible .
minimum temperature : 3c ( 37f ) .
stay up-to-date with the latest forecast here .

documents.title: headlines : mother describes 'scary ' canvey fairground ride malfunction boy , 15 , arrested over harlow murder
text: here are the top stories in essex this afternoon :
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: police concerned for missing chelmsford 22-year-old
text: essex police is concerned for the welfare of a 22-year-old man missing from his home in chelmsford .
patrick aspbury was last seen at 20:00 yesterday and searches are being carried out to find him .
he is described as 5ft 11in ( 1.8m ) tall , with light brown hair and a goatee beard .
he was wearing a grey sheepskin jacket , black round neck jumper and dark blue chinos .

documents.title: mother describes 'scary ' moment canvey fairground ride malfunctioned
text: a mother of two has described to bbc essex the `` scary '' moment she saw a fairground ride carrying children malfunction on canvey island .
the echo reported five children and a man were trapped on the crocodile ride at leisure fun park , in furtherwick road , on friday .
sophie-anne radley said : `` when it came down from the highest point you can see bolts and debris coming out the cart .
the noise was terrible all you could hear was screaming and crying '' .
the park 's manager , scott petty , said the ride has been taken out of action while it is inspected by officials .

documents.title: southend united take on sheffield united tonight
text: southend united are back in action tonight as they take on sheffield united at roots hall .
a win would see the blues climb five places in the league one table to eighth .
striker myles weston is hoping to return to the first team for the first time in four months after recovering from an injury affecting his heel and foot .
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: police appeal to tilbury victim 's friends
text: police investigating a sus death in tilbury are appealing for friends of the victim to come forward .
steven greenway , 49 , of riverside heights , dock road , was found dead inside a flat on 18 january .
a post-mortem examination indicated he may have been assaulted before he died .
det insp alan pitcher said : `` officers are attempting to build a of the events leading up to his death .
it is believed that steven had friends in the dagenham area of london . ''

documents.title: your tide out in westcliff-on-sea
text: thanks to bbc weather watcher angie who sent us this shot from westcliff-on-sea earlier today .
if you planning a trip out on the coast , the next high tide times for essex are as follows :
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: has a sinkhole appeared in purfleet ?
text: a ukip councillor has expressed alarm at what appears to be a sinkhole in a road in purfleet .
author: Your Thurrock

documents.title: national living wage to benefit castle point workers
text: castle point has been named as the third most likely area in britain to benefit from the new national living wage , with 32 % of workers due to get more money in their pockets .
a study by the resolution foundation said employees in the essex town would see a `` significant '' increase in their wage bill when it is introduced on friday .
the national living wage will be paid to workers aged 25 and above .
initially , it will be set at £ 7.20 an hour , with a target of it reaching more than £ 9 an hour by 2020 .

documents.title: weather : hail and thunder possible at times this afternoon
text: while some areas may remain dry throughout the afternoon , showers will develop later , with hail and thunder possible at times .
winds easing later .
maximum temperature : 12c ( 54f ) .
a full forecast for wherever you are can be found here .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: headlines : boy , 15 , arrested over hassan abdi mohamed murder cctv released after toy poodle dog theft
text: here are the top stories in essex this lunchtime :
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: driver bailed after m25 crash
text: a driver arrested after a crash which left three women in hospital and closed part of the m25 has been released on police bail .
a red scania lorry and a blue nissan crashed on the clockwise carriageway at epping at about 01:55 yesterday morning .
a 61-year-old man from telford , arrested on sus of dangerous driving and drink or drug driving , has been bailed until 27 june .

documents.title: woman rescued after a130 road crash
text: we 've got some more details on the crash which closed the a130 between the rettendon turnpike and howe green earlier .
essex fire and rescue says it released a trapped woman after a car and an agricultural vehicle collided .
she has been left in the care of the ambulance service .
all lanes have now reopened .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: surprise delivery ! baby born in mcdonald 's car park en route to southend hospital
text: while most families were tucking into easter eggs and eagerly awaiting their roast dinner , one couple had a very different easter sunday when their new baby was born en route to hospital .
author: Southend Echo

documents.title: cctv released after toy poodle dog theft
text: police have released a cctv image of two people they want to speak to after a dog was stolen from a front garden in grays .
minnie , a four-year-old toy poodle , was taken from rushdon close at about 20:00 on 29 february .
owner kellie bird said her son , who has attention deficit hyperactivity disorder , has been left `` devastated '' by the theft .

documents.title: travel : a130 closed between rettendon and howe green
text: the a130 is closed between the rettendon turnpike and howe green because of an accident .
essex police officer , colin shead , tweeted this from the scene .

documents.title: ukip essex county councillor resigns over 'bitter battles ' within the party
text: a ukip essex county councillor says he has resigned from the party because of a `` split with the clacton and north essex branch of ukip '' .
andy erskine ( who will now sit as an independent , told me he was fed-up with constant `` bitter battles '' within the party in tendring .
he added the ukip headquarters has n't `` got to grasps '' with the alleged problems engulfing the party , in the part of britain where ukip has had its best electoral success .
we 've contacted the party for a response .

documents.title: travel : london-bound a12 partially blocked by broken down vehicle
text: the london-bound a12 is partially blocked at j13 for ingatestone due to a broken down vehicle .
you can find the latest travel updates for essex here .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: police arrest 15-year-old boy over hassan abdi mohamed murder investigation
text: a teenage boy has been arrested on sus of murder after a father-of-two was stabbed to death in broad daylight , police say .
hassan abdi mohamed ( 48 , from harlow , was found collapsed on a path close to holly field in the town at 10:45 on 5 march .
a 15-year-old boy from north london was arrested in holloway yesterday and is currently being questioned .
another man , aged 18 , who was arrested on sus of murder earlier this month , remains on police bail .

documents.title: breakingboy , 15 , arrested on sus of hassan abdi mohamed murder
text: a 15-year-old boy has been arrested on sus of murder after a 48-year-old man was stabbed in harlow earlier this month .
more details to follow .

documents.title: colchester united secure back-to-back wins for first time since september
text: it was a good night for league one strugglers colchester united yesterday after they beat play-off hopefuls coventry 1-0 .
it 's the first time the u 's have secured back-to-back wins in the league since september .
forward gavin massey scored the only goal of the game , which helped his side move within seven points of safety .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: headlines : ukip essex county councillor resigns colchester united secure second easter win
text: headlines : ukip essex county councillor resigns colchester united secure second easter win
author: Sonia Watson
BBC Essex

text: today starts chilly for all , but it will be a largely dry morning with some sunny spells .
while some areas may remain dry throughout the day , showers will develop later , with hail and thunder possible at times .

documents.title: welcome to local live in essex
text: good morning and welcome to our local live page for essex .
join us until 18:00 for the latest news , sport , weather and travel for the county .
if you 'd like to get in touch you can email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
